desc: 50% all parameters (Guardian), probable damage reduction to 1, damage taken fills BB gauge and may restore HP, add to BB/SBB [chance to purge Atk, Def, Rec reduction negation], restores HP each turn & increases BB activation cost

dictionary.lore:
Upon donning the armor, an almost deafening silence is immediately apparent. The story of the nomads of Orebus is one told in hushed tones. Unwilling to join any of the six factions of Orebus, countless tribes of nomads hid themselves away.

From the raging wars between the factions and the golden ships from beyond the limits of the sky, to the golems and their pointless wars, the nomads had seen it all.

Though many died, the remainder clung desperately to life. Generations of silence had bred noise out of the race, and it was the faint hope of peace in a distant future that kept the nomads going.

name: Resolute Silence
